name: pages-functions-with-wasm-demo
description: A demo app that exemplifies wasm module imports in Pages Functions

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch app-web/src --ext "html,scss,js,mjs,ts,json" -x "yarn build:app-web && cp -r ./app-rust/pkg/ ./public/dist && npx wrangler pages dev public/dist "
scripts.build:app-web: rm -rf public/dist && parcel build app-web/src/*.html --dist-dir public/dist
scripts.build:app-rust: cd app-rust && mkdir -p ./pkg/ && rm -r ./pkg/ && wasm-pack build -d ./pkg/node && wasm-pack build --target web -d ./pkg/web && wasm-pack build --target no-modules -d ./pkg/no-modules && wasm-pack build  --target bundler -d ./pkg/bundler
scripts.publish:to-pages: yarn build:app-web && npx wrangler pages publish public/dist
